snippet: Ryan Lochte shaved a half-a-second off his best time in the 100-meter butterfly with a time of 51.65, but it wasn't enough to secure one of two Olympic berths.
abstract: Ryan Lochte shaved a half-a-second off his best time in the 100-meter butterfly with a time of 51.65, but it wasn't enough to secure one of two Olympic berths.

headline.main: A Personal Best Falls Short of Securing Lochte an Olympic Berth
